projects.name: Pokedex
projects.description: React App made with the Pokemon API where the user can search for Pokemons by name, ID or type to find information about them.

projects.name: Rick & Morty
projects.description: React App made with the Rick & Morty API, the user can search the locations of the series universe to get information about 'em like the name, location, characters; etc

projects.name: Trivia
projects.description: A trivia to test your knowledge in different topics.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: React App made with the Open Weather Map API, you can check the current weather in your location.

projects.name: Quote Machine
projects.description: A simple React App to generate random quotes and share your favorite on Twitter.
